definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: The perplexing problems of identifying the amount of SO42- in dyes are successfully solved.
sentences.chinese: 解決了分析染液中微量硫酸根離子的難題。

sentences.english: The perplexing problems of identifying the amount of SO4(superscript 2-) in dyes are successfully solved.
sentences.chinese: 解決了分析染液中微量硫酸根離子的難題。

sentences.english: How to circumvent the interferences of other acid during the non-aqueous titration of basic drugs with perchloric acid?
sentences.chinese: 非水滴定法中常見酸根的影響如何消除？

sentences.english: It can be applied to the determination of sulfate radical in molten salt corrosion products of Ni-base superalloy.
sentences.chinese: 適用於鎳基高溫合金浸鹽熱腐蝕產物中硫酸根的測定。

sentences.english: Objective To simplify the detection method of sulfate in the water purifying agent poly aluminium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的簡化淨水劑聚氯化鋁中硫酸根的分析方法。

sentences.english: Objective Try to find a method to determine the sulfate radicals in chromium plating bath with high iron ions.
sentences.chinese: 目的準確測定高含鐵量鍍鉻液中硫酸根的含量。

sentences.english: It is similar that the abnormal time and the abnormal shape of the silicic acid and the sulphate before the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 硅酸和硫酸根在同一地震前異常時間與異常形態相似。

sentences.english: An ion-chromatographic method for the determination of sulfate group of sulfated posaccharidesfrom laminaria was described .
sentences.chinese: 建立了用離子色譜測定海帶硫酸多糖硫酸根的方法。

definition: alkali salt (soda, lye, calcium carbonate etc)
